meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.2 released!
meta.summary: The new Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.2 has just been released. It includes a few bug fixes, a new reactive DB2 client, and reactive MySQL Client domain socket support.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 beta 1 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce the first 4.0 beta release of Eclipse Vert.x. Highlights of this release are the improved JDBC Client API, event loop affinity, and much more.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 milestone 5 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce the fifth 4.0 milestone release of Eclipse Vert.x. This release aims to provide a reliable distribution of the current development of Vert.x 4.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that the Eclipse Vert.x version 3.7.0 has been released.

meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.2
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.2, including Java 17 support, Vert.x Oracle Client and more.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 has been released. This is an important release introduceing a few changes ramping up to Vert.x 4.
